name: Adrenaline
short_description: One of the most popular scalpers in the community, it has been made free and open source because it is time for everyone to use it.

params.title: Adrenaline x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Label (Magic Name)
params.content: When it opens a trade it marks it with this label

params.title: Preset information
params.content: Some references to the preset in use, useful if you want to specify a specific back test period

params.title: Max Cross Coworking (zero = unlimited)
params.content: When used with multiple pairs limits the input to a predetermined number of simultaneous trades

params.title: Mode
params.content: You can choose to use moderate or aggressive logic

params.title: Stop Loss
params.content: The number of pips for the stop loss, e.g. 10 equals 10 pips

params.title: Take Profit
params.content: The number of pips for the take profit, e.g. 10 equals 10 pips

params.title: Lots
params.content: The number of lots to be used for opening the first trade.

params.title: Balance Multiplier (zero = disabled; es. 0.01 each € 1000 )
params.content: For every 1000€ these lots are added

params.title: Max Spread allowed
params.content: Max Spread allowed : Only triggers within a certain limit are considered, e.g. 1.5 will only consider spreads equal to or less than 1.5 pips

params.title: Max GAP Allowed (pips)
params.content: Protects against high volatility, e.g. if the value is 1 then all trades that have a GAP greater than 1 will be ignored, GAP is the distance between the close of the previous candle and the open of the current one which must not exceed 1 pip

params.title: Pause over this time
params.content: This parameter identifies the start time of the pause, e.g. 18.0 the cBot will no longer open positions from 18:00

params.title: Pause under this time
params.content: Marks the end of the pause, e.g. 8.20 the cBot will start opening new trades from 08:20

params.title: Multiplier
params.content: If the value of this parameter is zero then the control will not be considered even if enabled, it is the number of times the volume of the previous trade is multiplied to create exponentiality as positions increase

params.title: Max Loss Before Multiplier (zero = always)
params.content: The number of losses before it begins to multiply exponentially

params.title: Max Consecutive Loss (zero = unlimited)
params.content: The maximum number of consecutive losses before stopping the martingale

params.title: Period
params.content: The number of bars to be used for calculation.

params.title: Trigger value
params.content: The level that if exceeded triggers the trigger
